data.title: Freedom Coaching Form — PETER CRONE
data.text:
Mastermind and Freedom Members,

Submit a Video to Possibly Get Coached by Peter (For Free)

Fill out some info below and we will be in touch shortly if it’s a fit.

We can't wait to hear from you! Please email support@petercrone.com if you have any questions.

Submit Your Main Concern: Please submit your main concern in life by submitting at least 1 video. This concern can encompass any aspect of your life; personal or professional.

Submitting Additional Videos: We’d love you to ask people in your life to also share their experience of you in your video submissions, such as parents, spouses, siblings, or anyone else relevant to your concern. They don’t need to be Freedom members or Mastermind participants. Their perspectives and insights can provide valuable context to better understand your situation and offer tailored guidance.

Video Submission Guidelines: Please make sure that each of your video submissions is 2 minutes or less and in landscape mode. You may submit 4 videos in total. All people included in the videos submitted give full consent for the video and audio to be shared publicly (see below). We recommend these guidelines but it’s ok to submit without Video 2 or 3:

Video 1. You describing your challenges and question for Peter

Video 2. A friend or loved one on why you would make a great candidate to be coached by Peter (You can submit 2 of these videos!)

Video 3. A tour of your life // A day in your life (This could include your home, your job, your neighborhood, your pets, your art, your family…)
